task.title: Create a Post Using the Livefyre Mobile App
task.shortdesc: Add media to a post to provide near-instant access to an event from your mobile device.

step.cmd: Log in to the Livefyre mobile app.
Enter text or click on the camera icon to upload media.
Click on the camera icon to upload media.
Select media from your mobile device or use your camera to create new media to upload.
Add a caption over the text, “Add a Caption” under the media you uploaded.
